nodes.text: The Ranch was a farm located on the Mesric Plateau, on the desert world of Tatooine during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

The ranch was located near the city of Mos Eisley. Although Tatooine had few plains and little vegetation for grazing, the building was established as a ranch and several animal species, including banthas and eopies, were raised there. The ranch's location, on the edge of a cliff of the Mesric Plateau, created an impressive vista on the valley below.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the ranch was inhabited by Roric and Helen Goldenfield. Circa 1 ABY, the ranchers were harassed by a group of local pirates. Roric Goldenfield once managed to capture some of them while they were looting the ranch and hold them captive in the house. A spacer later met the pirate leader who tasked the adventurer to free the pirates. However, the spacer instead helped Helen Goldenfield to prevent the pirates to escape while her husband was contacting Imperial authorities.

The Ranch was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, players could complete a collection called "Panoramic Vistas."
